title: upgrading to Leopard
content:
I’m considering making the move up to Leopard, but I’ve heard murmuring somewhere that there are “font issues” with the new OS (what those are is still unclear to me). Can anyone confirm or elaborate? Or have any other advice before I upgrade? I use most of the standard Adobe CS products, as well as After Effects.

Thanks!
